content:
Hello,
is there an official way to monitor Zulip instance running in Kubernetes or Docker? I found nagios scripts but I can't figure out how to use them in this case.
Many thanks.
@Alex Ivanov I don't think we have an official way to run the Nagios checks that we ship via whatever Kubernetes monitoring things people use.
If you want to collaborate on that, I'd be happy to provide advice (I don't personally know the kubernetes monitoring ecosystem).
